name: TonosamaGekomon
description: ShogunGekomon takes the form of a red toad/bullfrog that has a hysterical look and a small, pointed tail. It has a pair of moustache-like whiskers, pointed teeth, an antenna with a purple tip resembling the chonmage on its head, and two musical horns extending from its shoulder blades. It has a green leafy ruff around its neck and a yellow stomach with an outie belly button covered by two bandages across it.
